title: Raking Forests to Prevent Wildfires
summary: After devastating California wildfires, Trump suggested the problem was lack of 'raking' the forest floors. Claimed Finland's president told him they prevent fires by raking. Finland's president denied ever saying this.
keyFacts: November 2018: After devastating California wildfires, suggested problem was lack of 'raking'
'You've got to take care of the floors. You know the floors of the forest, very important... they don't do any forest management'
Claimed Finland's president told him they prevent fires by raking
Finland's president denied ever saying this
California wildfires driven by climate change, drought, and wind - not insufficient raking
